column4: how can I assigne domains and subdomains on ubuntu? (i.e www.myserver.com and mail.myserver.com) on the same machine?
the same A record (contain the IP address) in your DNS management interface
so it is not related to ubuntu I can do it from firewall or something?
you *could* divert your DNS management to a DNS server (like bind or dnsmasq) on your ubuntu machine, but for a simple configuration like this, A records are just fine
